title: Love in Okinawa
synopsis: Will life be one of married bliss for Naoki and Kotoko? In one of the most-anticipated sequels, the unlikely couple of the average Kotoko (Miki Honoka) and the brilliant Naoki (Yuki Furukawa) from “Mischievous Kiss: Love in TOKYO” returns for a second season! After the original series ended with the wedding of Naoki and Kotoko, the special episode “Mischievous Kiss 2: Love in Okinawa” follows Naoki and Kotoko on their honeymoon.

title: Goodbye, Tetsuya-kun...
synopsis: Papa and Mama warmly welcome Reiko back and move forward with the marriage meeting. Aoi moves in with Tetsuya after Reiko left, but Tetsuya is inattentive as his mind if filled with Reiko. He sees news on TV reporting several road closures in Shimoda, Izu due to heavy rain. Worried about Reiko, Tetsuya can no longer contain himself...

title: Reiko in Danger! Sweet Trap of a High School Girl
synopsis: Reiko’s new rival appears. A 16-year old Aoi Nakamori, a girl Tetsuya is tutoring. While acting as an innocent high school girl, she’s eagerly waiting for her opportunity to be Tetsuya’s girlfriend. Angered by the fact Tetsuya cancelled the long awaited Okinawa trip, Reiko goes back to her parents’ home saying she will accept the marriage meeting.

title: One-Sided Love
synopsis: Reiko’s rival, Ayame Kakitsubata, is in love. She has fallen for Tetsuya’s friend, Aoki, who is working construction in her neighborhood. The usual stuck-up Ayame has transformed into a girl hopely in love with Aoki. Touched by Ayame’s admission, Reiko decides to help her. But Reiko’s strong belief of “one-sided love is the ultimate love” causes things to take an unexpected turn. What will happen to Ayame’s love...? less

title: It's Shiwatowi Reiko!
synopsis: Surprisingly, Reiko used to be a timid, shy girl in kindergarten. Uzumaki, a young maid for the Shiratori family, tries to protect Reiko but is hurt when she is targeted by bullies instead of Reiko. Reiko swears to be stronger. Her baby talk is cured as well. One day, the neighborhood bully, Tetsuya, admits he likes her. But Reiko laughs it off by saying, “as if I’ll ever like a boy like you!”

title: Reiko is Invisible?!
synopsis: “I love Junko.” Feeling as though she was hit by a lightening, Reiko was suddenly dumped by Tetsuya. From the shock, Reiko’s body starts turning invisible. Tetsuya and Junko visits the transparent Reiko. Believing that a shock therapy will snap Reiko out of her shock, Tetsuya calls her rival, Ayame Kakitsubata. Ayame comes to see the transparent Reiko...

title: Who's Truly Being Loved?
synopsis: The two hearts are in love, but they don’t understand each other. Tetsuya’s ex-girlfriend, Junko, shows up. Tetsuya feels he’s being played by Reiko, unable to understand her behavior. He’s moved by Junko’s pure affection and leaves Reiko. Reiko, wanting to believe that “Tetsuya is just using Junko before he makes his move on her,” goes to Junko’s apartment…

title: This is My Love Palace!
synopsis: Reiko has finally started living together with Tetsuya. They go to the public bath together, walk home together, but they’re not sleeping together in one futon. Shocked, Reiko yells, “this is not how I imagined living together!” and leaves Tetsuya’s apartment to work at a Chinese restaurant. Where will Reiko find her perfect “Love Palace”?

title: Please Help Yourself to My Chocolate!
synopsis: Things get good as Reiko gives Tetsuya Valentine's Day chocolates, but when he tries to kiss her, she unthinkingly smacks him.

title: I Won't be Outdone When it Comes to Fancy Lady Power!
synopsis: A new rival appears!

title: The World-Famous Shiratori Reiko Comes Calling!
synopsis: Reiko moves to Tokyo to allow the man she denied a second chance at her love.

title: Untitled
synopsis: After a total loss to David, the beauty boys are disbanded by Saigoyama. However, upon seeing the sad faces of Midori and Aoi, David's victory is called into question. While playing old maid in the back room, Kei has a sudden realization. “Can you do as I say?” Inspired by Kei's confidence, the boys agree to follow him. The beauty boys are reunited! This battle isn't over!

title: Untitled
synopsis: The difference in skill between the beauty boys and David was obvious. Faced with their loss against the perfect concierge David, the beauty boys are in a bind, and they lose their resolve. However, Kondo makes them realize they've been so caught up in the contest they haven't been understanding how Midori or Aoi feel. What is the true mission of Celebrity? What is beauty? The boys are ready for a rematch!

title: Untitled
synopsis: The uncanny man in black who suddenly appeared to "Celebrity," his name is David Shun Maruyama. He declares a 1 on 5 "beauty battle" against the beauty boys, under the condition where if he wins, the beauty boys have to break up. This time, twin sisters Midori (Anko Sato) and Aoi (Yoko Sato) Suzukawa are invited to "Celebrity". They look very much alike but their personalities are polar opposite. Will the beauty boys be able to lead them to the realm of true beauty, and win the battle?

title: Untitled
synopsis: The old lady who forgot to smile. After all it was she who hid Kei's scissor, not Kondo. She says, out of loneliness, she mindly did it. Apologizing Kei, as she decides to leave the salon, Kondo calls after her. "If you don't smile, we cannot make you beautiful!" Will the beauty boys be able to provide her the very best of "Celebrity"? less

title: Untitled
synopsis: This time "Celebrity" welcomes Shizuno Makimura (Yasuko Mori), a white haired old lady. She looks dark and gloomy, and seems to be losing her vigor to live. The beauty boys try their best to cheer her up, but just then Kei's scissor gets lost...

title: Untitled
synopsis: Of all things, Jun painted Aimi's nails pitch black and shut himself in his room. While Rui tries to persuade Jun, he also became exasperated, and they start to dispute loudly. Will Rui be able to open Jun's door? And what is the meaning of the white aster that connects them two?

title: Untitled
synopsis: The two brothers Rui and Jun are always very close. Rui especially was seemingly overprotective about his younger brother Jun. However, as Jun starts tending the egocentric Aimi Morisaki (Myuko Nishiyama), he begins to feel displeased by Rui... With this crisis, will the beauty boys be able to transform her beautifully?

title: Untitled
synopsis: By violently cutting Ako's hair, Go gets fired from the salon. As Go leaves the salon, Saigoyama casts a meaningful line. "You cannot extend beauty over a mask." Ako, who deceits herself by lying and being selfish, and Sayuri, who pretends not to notice it. Will Go be able to take off their masks and turn them truly beautiful?

title: Untitled
synopsis: Go is in charge of still a childlike girl Ako Horibe (Moe Miura). However, her selfish and impudent attitude angers Go, and they start to dispute. Her seemingly loving mother Sayuri (Aya Nakamura) seems to have some issues as well, and... Will the beauty boys be able to open up their hearts?

title: Untitled
synopsis: Naoko destroys her new hairstyle formed through Ryo's perfect calculation. Knowing that he had no fault, Ryo rejects to be in charge of her. Naoko insists that she wants "to shine once more as I get married!", but her impatience only seems to work against her will... After being denied of his work for the first time, will Ryo be able to truly shine Naoko as she desires?

title: Untitled
synopsis: With his perfect "formula of beauty," Ryo is in charge of Naoko Takamura, an elite career woman. She hopes to marry a rich man and quit her job. Just as she ordered, Ryo finished her hair perfectly in style. However, as she sees her new hairstyle, she abruptly worsens her temper...

title: Untitled
synopsis: After Kei cutting her hair drastically, Satomi stormed out of the salon. The next day, she returned with pictures she took with Saeko a long time ago. "You'd see from this picture, wouldn't you? I'm a loser. Even my first boyfriend was taken by Saeko!" Will Kei be able to awaken her true beauty, dispite her hatred toward her friend?

title: Untitled
synopsis: The "Celebrity" is the ultimate beauty salon one can visit only once in her lifetime. The guest the beauty boys welcomed was a twenty year old college student, Satomi Nakata, who lost herself into a total refusal of becoming beautiful. Will the beauty boys be able to transform her beautifully, out of her misery and loss of her self confidence?

title: A Glass of Happiness, Kawahagi Otsukuri
synopsis: Wakako has kawahagi otsukuri to celebrate becoming an aunt.

title: Party Organizer, Yakiton
synopsis: Wakako is put in charge of finding a restaurant for a company get-together.

title: Simmered Kinmedai
synopsis: Wakako becomes an aunt. She has tai and beef tofu to celebrate.

title: My First Morning Drink, Offal Stew
synopsis: Wakako forgets her phone in the taxi, and ends up in an unfamiliar city. She discovers the joys of drinking in the morning.

title: Pre-Payday Fried Canned Tuna Mayo
synopsis: It's the day before pay day, but Wakako still wants good food. She visits Gokurakuya for a fun, homely beer, and then Kinkonkan for unusual canned food.

title: Perfect Match! Asian Food
synopsis: Wakako goes for Okinawa food, and then to Thai cuisine, where she learns a on on surprising pairings.

title: Attack! Food Stand Oden
synopsis: Wakako wants to try an oden stand, but she first visits Senju for saikyoyaki.

title: Drunken Fist! Grown-up Mapo
synopsis: Wakako goes out for some ray fins. Her dad is upset that she isn't calling home.

title: Shrimp Ajillo at a Fancy Bar
synopsis: Wakako has plans to meet up with her friend for dinner. But first, she wanders into a fancy Spanish restaurant.

title: Tastes of Hiroshima, Oyster and Lemon Hot Pot
synopsis: Wakako finds a shop that serves food from her home of Hiroshima. As luck would have it, she finds a Hiroshima food restaurant in the middle of Tokyo, too.

title: Heartwarming Deep-fried Burdock Root
synopsis: Wakako has some warm sake to top off a heartwarming day.

title: Classic Beer Food: Deep-fried Mackerel
synopsis: Wakako has fried mackerel, cold draft beer, yamakake tuna and mokkiri sake.

title: Bar-Hopping
synopsis: Wakako winds up back at her old stand-by where she has some kani miso and ends up reserving her own bottle of shochu and is tasked with writing something on its tag.

title: Celebratory Drinks
synopsis: Wakako and some friends reminisce about a wedding and some of the delicious dishes they had at the reception.

title: Okonomiyaki
synopsis: Wakako visits her hometown of Hiroshima and her friend Aya. The two of them have a special type of okonomiyaki known as Fuchuyaki.

title: Yakitori
synopsis: Wakako starts off with delicious fried chicken and beer. Fearing that she's gained weight, Wakako's next meal is some healthier yakitori.

title: Drinking at Home
synopsis: Wakako decides to dine at home where she consumes various special snacks while waiting for her stew to cook.

title: Dashimaki-tamago
synopsis: Wakako can't wait to sink her teeth into some light and fluffy dashimaki-tamago and wash it down with some warm sake.

title: Girls' Night
synopsis: Wakako and her friends get together for a girls' night where they try out various snacks and have some drinks.

title: Manta Ray Fins
synopsis: After a hectic work day Wakako stops off for a light snack of ray fins and a warm sake. A slight mishap with roasted gingko nuts leads to a conversation with a fellow patron.

title: Zaru Tofu
synopsis: Wakako tries out a new place and orders up a warm sake and zaru tofu made from organic soybeans.

title: Monkfish Liver in Ponzu
synopsis: While toiling over a bad day at work, Wakako consoles herself with some warm sake and some oderiferous monkfish liver in ponzu.

title: Fried Gyoza
synopsis: After narrowly escaping an extra day of work Wakoko sets out on the town for some garlic gyoza and a cold beer.

title: Salt-grilled Salmon
synopsis: After a hard day of work Wakako stops off for some salt-grilled salmon and cold sake.

title: The Miracle of the Shooting Star
synopsis: Kotoko confesses to Jinko and Satomi about Kin-chan’s marriage proposal to her, and they tell her to give it serious thought. Naoki finishes the betrothal ceremony with Sahoko, and gradually gets ready for their wedding. He returns to college after a long leave of absence, and finds out Kinnosuke proposed to Kotoko. About the same time, Kinnosuke asks for Kotoko to give him an answer ...

title: Goodbye, Irie-kun
synopsis: Naoki started seeing Sahoko with the intention of getting married, and on the other hand Kotoko starts dating Kinnosuke. Her date with Kinnosuke is more fun than she expects, but Kotoko’s heart still yearns for Naoki. One day, Shigeo says to Kotoko that they must leave the Irie home, so as to not get in the way of the wedding. Tears well up in Kotoko’s eyes, as she realizes the time has finally come to give up her feelings for Naoki.

title: Where Love Parts Ways
synopsis: Though Kotoko felt she had made a connection to Naoki’s heart, she is shocked to hear suddenly about his marriage-interview. The partner of the interview is Oizumi Sahoko, the granddaughter of the chairman of Hokuei Company, who is considering funding Shigeki’s company. Noriko and Kotoko plan to ruin their marriage-interview, as they panic at the prospect of Naoki’s marriage to a perfect lady. Matsumoto comes to the aid as well, but ...

title: A Trick of Fate
synopsis: After Shigeki’s heart attack, Naoki decides to help out with company business until his father recovers. But Naoki discovers that the company is in serious financial trouble. Kotoko cares tirely for Naoki, as she is concerned about his well being, considering he gave a leave of absence to school, and maybe would have to abandon his dream of becoming a doctor. On the other hand, Matsumoto decides to profess her love to Naoki. Kotoko finds out about it, and then ... less

title: Toward Everyone's Own Dream...
synopsis: Kotoko has moved up to her second year in college. But she begins to panic as she sees her friends Jinko and others steadily forging ahead toward their future. One night a promotion party is thrown at the Irie home, and the entire family is there. Naoki angrily storms out of the house after being asked by Shigeki to become his company's presidential successor. Kotoko goes after Naoki, and he confides the dream of his own future to her ...

title: My Sweetheart is Santa Claus
synopsis: Kotoko is supposed to spend Christmas eve with Jinko and Satomi, but they cancel on her unexpectedly. Kotoko is now all alone at the Irie family’s house. Meanwhile, on his way to Shigeki’s company’s 20th anniversary party, Naoki sees Jinko and her boyfriend in town. On the other hand, Kinnosuke coincidentally encounters Satomi and her boyfriend at the restaurant Aihara. Kinnosuke decides to surprise Kotoko, since she is spending Christmas eve all alone...

title: A Snowy Night's Confession
synopsis: The adults vacate the home, and Kotoko and Yuki are left to watch the house in their absence. But Yuki suddenly comes down with a severe stomach pain, and Kotoko is in a panic. But one thing leads to another, and the crisis is averted. Naoki rushes to the hospital and is relieved by the situation. But snow begins to fall, and Kotoko has no way to get home. She must spend the night at Naoki's apartment! But since Yuki is still hospitalized, Kotoko knows that her heart-throbbing anticipation is imprudent. Then she hears an unexpected confession from Naoki ...

title: The Time to Give Up on Love
synopsis: Kotoko is happy to hear that Naoki does "not-not like" her, but soon after he said that, Naoki moves out to live on his own. Feeling down, Kotoko goes to Naoki's place of employment, but is given the cold shoulder. Naoki is extremely secretive about his new residence, so Kotoko decides to pursue him to see where he lives. But Kotoko witnesses him going into the Matsumoto residence, and is devastated that the two of them are now living together. Naoki senses that something is not quite right with Kotoko ...

title: The Sudden First Date
synopsis: Thanks to Noriko's scheming, Kotoko and her father move back in to the Irie home. Noriko is delighted, and tries to talk Kotoko into dating Naoki, but Naoki goes out on a date with Matsumoto instead. Sudo senpai has a crush on Matsumoto, so he and Kotoko collaborate to stalk the date. On the other hand, Kinnosuke is misled to think that Sudo has taken Kotoko on an “adult” date, and goes looking for Kotoko ...

title: The Service Ace of Love
synopsis: Kotoko has to leave the Irie home, and decides to give up on Naoki. But she is determined to pursue the grueling training in tennis. It so happens that she is challenged to a pairs match, paired with Naoki against the Sudo-Matsumoto team. Naoki loses for the first time in his life, so he decides to coach Kotoko in tennis. On the other hand, Noriko misses Kotoko and goes undercover to the university, where she gets the news that Naoki and Kotoko have had their first kiss.

title: A Rival Enters the Scene?! A Love with Grim Prospects
synopsis: After their first kiss, nothing changes between Kotoko and Naoki. Kotoko is now a college student, and a powerful love-rival Matsumoto Yuko emerges at the university. Kotoko and Naoki are in different departments, but Kotoko pursues ways to get closer to Naoki. She joins the tennis club he's in, but she cannot keep up with the training. On one of those nights, Kotoko's father decides to leave the Irie home, because he wants Kotoko to give up on Naoki. This comes as a big shock to Kotoko.

title: Who Will Get the First Kiss?!
synopsis: The time of the graduation ceremony has come. Naoki decides to stay on at Tonan University, but Kin-chan, who didn't pass the entrance exams, thinks of his future and decides to find employment. Class F winds up at the same hall with Class A for their respective faculty thank-you parties; a clash between them ensues, and now the mood turns grim. Naoki eventually teases Kotoko in front of everyone. Kotoko gets back at him by exposing his boyhood transvestite photo to everyone. Furious, Naoki calls out Kotoko, and suddenly plants a kiss on her.

title: Chocolate is Love's Good Luck Charm?!
synopsis: It is entrance exams season. Kotoko passes the entrance exams to Tonan University. On the other hand Naoki reluctantly goes to take the National Center Exams as an obligation to his father. Because of Kotoko's hand-made good-luck charm, Naoki's day of exams is riddled with troubles. Then on the day of entrance exams to Tokyo University, Kotoko tags along with Naoki, but collapses at the gate from a severe stomach pain.

title: Morning Coffee is the Aroma of Love?!
synopsis: Kotoko is depressed because of Naoki's gloominess for having the news exposed to the entire school that they are living in the same home. But she gets a glimmer of hope because Naoki says to Kin-chan, who came to spy on the Irie family: "Today you hate someone, but tomorrow you love them." On the last day of Summer vacation, however, the house is vacant except for Naoki and Kotoko. Now that the two of them are all by themselves ...

title: Entrance Exam of Love
synopsis: Kotoko is now living with the Irie family, but Naoki is cold as ever. Naoki's mother Noriko always wanted a daughter, so she is ecstatic. Noriko gives Kotoko a photo of Naoki as a young boy dressed in girl's clothes. Kotoko now has the upper hand because she holds Naoki's secret embarrassment of his transvestite past, so she plans to have him tutor her for the final examinations, in order to enter the list of top 100 scores.

title: Love Comes Riding a Shooting Star
synopsis: Aihara Kotoko is a lagging Class F student at the High School Annex of Tonan University, who has a crush on Irie Naoki, an outstanding Class A student rumored to have 200 IQ. She decides to profess her love to him, and hands him a love letter. But he rejects her outright with a simple "No thanks." Kotoko with a wounded heart moves to a new home with her father, but the house gets destroyed by a meteorite. Because they have nowhere to go, she moves in with her father to his best friend's home. However ...

title: Naoshima: Art Island
synopsis: Welcome to Naoshima, aka "Art Island." This island is like a giant, outdoor museum that contains giant indoor museums (as well as a bunch of art). Koichi takes you to the James Bond Museum, the Chi Chu Art Museum, and even interviews a professional Japanese baseball player. How artistic. Music with words by the Brave Chandeliers: http://bravechandeliers.com

title: Yoro Park: The Site Of Reversible Destiny
synopsis: If you were tasked with creating a park, but your goal was to make it as dangerous and artistic as possible, you would probably come up with something like this. This park is known as "the site of reversible destiny" probably because nothing here makes very much sense. That's also what makes it a lot of fun. Music with words by the Brave Chandeliers: http://bravechandeliers.com Image Credits: Toyota Picture: http://www.flickr.com/photos/mujitra/2937592607/ Clown Picture: http://www.flickr.com/photos/fpat/3803820057/

title: Cat Island, Part 2
synopsis: The second installment of "Cat Island." Surprisingly, there are actually cats in this video. Music with words by the Brave Chandeliers: http://bravechandeliers.com

title: Cat Island
synopsis: Did you know that there's an island in Japan known for being covered in... cats? Like, we're talking hundreds of them. Furry, adorable, inbred, cats. Let us take you to this magical place. Music with words by the Brave Chandeliers: http://bravechandeliers.com

title: Matthew x Ginger
synopsis: Horror - Hellish Horrors from Beyond

title: Moon & Wolf vs Sheila & Syler
synopsis: Crossplay -Boy-Girl/flip

title: Ashpord vs Rachael
synopsis: Interstellar - Out of this World Outfits

title: Celeste vs Genevieve
synopsis: Tsundere

title: Quinn x Shana
synopsis: Bishojo

title: Nathan x Ali
synopsis: Monster Hunter

title: Trailer 1
synopsis: Trailer for Call to Cosplay

title: Super Mario Beatbox
synopsis: Super Mario Beatbox

title: Daft Punk Beatbox
synopsis: Daft Punk Beatbox

title: Kanye West Beatbox
synopsis: Kanye West Beatbox

title: Justin Timberlake Beatbox Cover
synopsis: Justin Timberlake Beatbox Cover

title: Hikakin Beatbox Live
synopsis: Hikakin Beatbox Live

title: Crunchyroll Shout Out Video
synopsis: Crunchyroll Shout Out Video

title: Untitled
synopsis: You taught me that. A butler also has a right to choose customers. A butler who is hated by a lady is no longer a butler.

title: Untitled
synopsis: However, people will realize whose tears they are right after the rain stops.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Don't let that loser actor get in your way. That guy's trying to destroy your chances.

title: Untitled
synopsis: You're the leader of the Happy Boys making fair ladies happy. Be aware of it.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Kokoro-kun regrets what he did. What he did insults the other fair ladies.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Put your 5 heads together and invent a dessert that will make all the fair ladies happy.

title: Untitled
synopsis: My Lady, would you please come with us? I want you to be a witness.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Happiness can sometimes be destroyed by too much love.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Todays special dessert is based on your personality.

title: Untitled
synopsis: It's just like the military. But if you hang in there, you'll become a cool guy like Mr. Katanosaka.

title: Untitled
synopsis: Those boys didn't come back after all. Remember the promise; you buy the pork shabu special.

title: Untitled
synopsis: I have heard the story before. Happiness is not what we grasp on our own, but it is given to us by someone else.

title: The Valley of the Linear Car, Secluded Stations,and Transportation
synopsis: Iida City amazing trains!

title: The Valley Where the Gods Come Down
synopsis: All about faith.

title: The Treasury of Food! The Valley of Yakiniku and Fruits.
synopsis: All about Food.

title: The Valley of Pop Culture and Puppet Shows
synopsis: Pop Culture and Puppets
